SELECT t.*, t1.sample_design_pic, t1.color_name, t1.band_code FROM t_sample_style_group t LEFT JOIN t_sample_style_color t1 ON t.style_no = t1.style_no WHERE t.company_code = #{companyCode} and t.del_flag = '0'
and t.group_code like "%"#{groupCode}"%"
and t.group_name like "%"#{groupName}"%"
and t.style_no like "%"#{styleNo}"%"
and t.remarks like "%"#{remarks}"%"

SELECT t.id, t.company_code, t.create_name, t.create_date, t.update_name, t.update_date, t2.group_code, t2.group_name, t.style_no, t1.sample_design_pic, t1.color_name, t1.band_code FROM t_sample_style_group_color t LEFT JOIN t_sample_style_group t2 ON t.group_code = t2.group_code LEFT JOIN t_sample_style_color t1 ON t.style_no = t1.style_no WHERE t.company_code = #{companyCode} and t.del_flag = '0' and t.group_code = #{groupCode}

SELECT t.*, t1.sample_design_pic, t1.color_name, t1.band_code FROM t_sample_style_group t LEFT JOIN t_sample_style_color t1 ON t.style_no = t1.style_no WHERE t.company_code = #{companyCode} and t.del_flag = '0' and t.id = #{id}
